result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: DNA Proof of Submission
from DOC
of LGSO Correctional Officer
DNA Order and Acknowledgement

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez in court.  Galen Bayne-Allison appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls  @ 2:26 pm.  Susan Rascon, Interpreter appears in court, duly sworn on oath. State gives plea agreement, plea to Ct 1, Ct 2 DRI, Ct 1 withheld sentence 1 year probation, AODA and follow through with recommendation, cost, no contact with HMB, DOB 1-31-97. State has complied with victim rights. Def. agrees with plea agreement, Court advised def. of citizenship rights. Def. still wishes to proceed with plea agreement.  Def. has completed waiver of attorney rights. Def. understands charge & penalties. Def. questions if he still can get an attorney. Court will grant an adjournment if def. wishes to hire an attorney. Def. wishes to get case resolved today. Def. would like to continue today.  Court accepts waiver of atty rights & finds freely & voluntarily given. Plea questionnaire & waiver of rights filed.  Ct. 1, Disorderly Conduct, no contest plea.  Def. advised of constitutional rights. Def. understands elements. Ct 2 DRI, Court finds plea is freely & voluntarily given. Court has reviewed criminal complaint, Factual basis stipulated with State.  Court finds factual basis, accepts plea & finds def. Guilty to D.C. as Domestic Abuse.  State gives sentencing recommendation. Def. has nothing to say.  Court agrees with plea agreement & orders on ct 1 withheld jail sentence 1 year probation, AODA and complete any recommendation with assessment, No contact with HMB, costs, DNA Sample & 200 DNA Surcharge. Bond applied & balance returned to poster. Court does not read paragraph because money all taken care off. Def. advised of postconviction rights.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Called at 1:36 pm.  Interpreter Susan Rascon duly sworn on oath. Interpreter appears by phone.  File reviewed on record.  Def was give form for Court appointed atty.  Def has completed form, given to Judge.  Judge completes caption of case.  Form reviewed.  Def is not eligible for court appointed atty.  DA has made an offer to def.  Def has received offer.  Def will accept offer.  Atty Uttke puts offer on record with disposition.  Def will accept offer.  Off record for scheduling.  Interpreter in person for plea & sentencing.  Back on record.  Date has been set and interpreter will be present.  Waiver of Atty and plea advisement form in spanish provided to def.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 8, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Nicolas Achua Juarez

Prior: W7288 Mayking Road, Antigo, WI 54409

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Called at 1:37 pm  Interpreter Susan Rascon duly sworn on oath.  Court reviews status of case.  Form for court appointed, def indicates was only in english.  Court will provide form in spanish.  Judge reviewed form, def given form.  Judge completes caption and case number.  Off record to check dates for interpreter.  No interpreter scheduled.  Back on record.  New date set.  Def to update his address in clerk of courts office.  Hearing scheduled for March 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called at 1:27 pm  Interpreter Teresa  Berger duly sworn on oath.  Interpreter appears by phone.  Def failed to appear for a hearing in August.  Warrant was issued, def posted bond.  Court reviews file.  Court reviews charges with possible penalties.  Def advised of right to an atty.  Def wishes to contact the public defender's office.  Court questions def employment and hourly wage.  Atty Schuster,public defender present in court.  Atty Schuster indicates that def would not qualify.   Petition for court appointed atty form provided in spanish to def.  Hearing scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Bond Receipt and Appearance Bail Bond Agreement

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez not in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Called at 2:25 pm.  Court reviews file.  Def failed to appear on Aug 19, 2015.  Warrant has been issued.   Bond forfeiture notices have been sent.  Court will forfeit bond to Langlade County.

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez not in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls  @ 9:21 am  Interpreter present.  Court reviews file.  Def was advised of todays date and was going to take the State's offer.  State moves to forfeit bond posted and warrant with bond of $1000.00  Court will forfeit $650.00 and will authorize warrant with bond of $1000. or body only.  State wide  (vertified with Judge, bond forfeited pending hearing)

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter Enrique Soria appears by phone.  Interpreter sworn in on previous case.  Def has copy of complaint.  Court reads charges with possible penalties.   Def advised of right to an atty.  Def wishes to proceed without counsel.  Court will set for status conference to see if agreement can be reached.  Court instructs clerk to enter not guilty pleas.  State have provided a written disposition of this case to def.    Def wishes to proceed with offer.  Not guilty pleas to be entered. Bond will continue with conditions.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Nicolas Achua Juarez in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reads charges with possible penalties.   Def has copy of complaint.  Individual present to help def to understand.  Def advised of right to an atty.  State request bond that posted be bond with conditions.  Court sets bond with conditions.  Interpreter needed  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
When accepted through protect Judge Kawalski defaulted.
